encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Families in Early Ptolemaic Egypt
bibl.note: Examines demographic questions (in part. differences between 'Greeks' and 'Egyptians' in sizes of household, patterns of family living and treatment of females) in the light of tax-registers. [The documents used in this study will shortly be published (or republished) as part of a larger project, as the first part (P. Count) of W. Clarysse and D.J. Thompson, Counting the People.]
